name: Lego Islands (danihero)
description:
Lego Islands

Lego islands is a short edited minigame with lossless 344kh audio, up to 8k shaders with 128-bit HDR. This Lego game is made for the next generation of gaming.

Want the source?

Put it in the discussion board and I will upload the zip file source (It's about 2gb of size. Final packaged game was ultra compressed, and that is why it is a 7z file.
